sourcesContent:
import React, { useContext, useState } from 'react' import BookStoreContext from '../../Context/bookStorContext'; export const CartItem = ({ item }) => { const { image, title, author, quantity, price, id } = item; const [qty,setQty]=useState(1) const { removeFromCart, addToCart } = useContext(BookStoreContext); return (

Title : {title}

Authors : {author}

{quantity}
{Math.floor(price * quantity)}$
removeFromCart(id)} class="bi bi-trash-fill">
) }
